channel.title: New Player Training
channel.description:
As we all know, this game can be a little intimidating at first. Everyone has to start somewhere, but new players can sometimes feel overwhelmed (I totally did!). I'm here to help! I am going to start playing one or two games a night of newbie friendly games, after which I will make myself available for voice chat to answer questions. I'll also start doing some educational streams where I will play the game and have someone watching the twitch chat to alert me to any questions. Experienced players, you are definitely welcome too, as long as you remain friendly and help the new players as best you can. All I ask is that all the newbies get into the game.
I found a great group of people to help me learn the game, and now it's time to pass it forward. You can find me on Discord as @coin operated#1988 and in game as RedneckHipster .

item.title: New Player Training

item.description:
There are tons of Guides on this forum. Make sure to check them out and maybe even include them.

Read full topic

Im certainly interested in supporting this, any time I’m around if I dont have schoolwork when these are going on Ill sit in and help out. Glad to see so many others interested in helping out too.

item.title: New Player Training
item.dc:creator: RedneckHipster
item.description:
FYI, we’re getting severe weather alerts (we’re gonna have two whole flakes of snow in Alabama!) so if I don’t show up, it’s because the abominable snow man ate me. I’m going to try to be around Monday - Thursdays at 8pm EST, however.

Read full topic

item.title: New Player Training
item.dc:creator: RedneckHipster
item.description:
I welcome all help! Tonight, at 8 pm Eastern time (5 hours from this post), I’m going to do a few new person friendly runs, then Questions and Answers in voice chat between each. All are welcome, New players, experienced players, all I ask is that everyone is nice to each other.

Read full topic

item.title: New Player Training
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I’d like to second this. While I am not a streamer I can use discord to watch someone play and explain what is going on at any given moment in game. I could also go basically the same thing as Redneck with discord instead of twitch.

My discord is: NuclearBurrito#4437
